instructions:
STUFFING
1 cup herb-seasoned stuffing
1/4 cup onion, chopped
1/4 tsp oregano
1/3 cup water
2 tbsp butter or margarine

Prepare stuffing according to package directions except using above proportions. Fill pork chop pockets
with stuffing and skewer or sew. Place chops in greased
baking dish, brush with soy sauce and pour pizza sauce with sugar over meat. Cover tightly with foil and
bake in 350-degree oven for 1 1/4 to 1 1/2 hours. Remove foil and top with half slice of cheese. Return to
oven to melt cheese.

For a quick entree:
Use 4 pork chops, *(or blade or butt steaks)*. Place in greased baking dish, brush with soy sauce and pour
pizza sauce with sugar over meat. Cover tightly with foil and bake in 350 F oven for about 50 minutes.
Remove from oven and top with half slice cheese. Return to oven to melt cheese. 
*(Rev. 2/19/96)*
name: Pizza Pork Chops
